item.def:
Open: 6.00 am till 10.00 pm<br/>Number of Seats: 54 persons<br/>
Turmeric Restaurant located on the first floor boasts the impressive interior design and finest locale in the heart of Phnom Penh.
Turmeric serves a variety of Asian and Western food for breakfast, lunch and dinner in a la carte and set menu.
item.name: Overview
